definition: old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: When a large mass is there, such as a star, it will be collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 但當一個質量大嘅星球放上去，就會塌左落去。

sentences.english: I am lucky to have colleagues who likes to eat as much as I do.
sentences.chinese: 非常好運地可以和一班鐘意食嘢嘅同事一齊。

sentences.english: I remember when she first came to Hong Kong, my teacher was still alive.
sentences.chinese: 記得佢第一次嚟香港時，我嘅老師還健喺。

sentences.english: D7. What is your working industry?
This is probably temporary and should be fixed soon.
sentences.chinese: 呢個問題都系暫時性嘅同埋將會盡快修復。

sentences.english: So good to eat with many people because we can try out a lot of different food!
sentences.chinese: 人多食火窩真繫好，可以食好多唔同嘅食物。

sentences.english: Sounde weird to me what on earth is this wine?
sentences.chinese: 我好奇怪，點解會有罎咁嘅酒。

sentences.english: I learn from the doctor who have to use chinese and western medical for me.
sentences.chinese: 我學今日用中西何合璧幫我睇病嘅嗰個醫生。

sentences.english: D6. What is your job position?
We went first to the Canberra Glassworks.
sentences.chinese: 我哋先去參觀堪培拉嘅玻璃廠。

sentences.english: The train to Tung Chung is arriving.
sentences.chinese: 前往東湧嘅列車即將到達。

sentences.english: Then I put Taro Mori Kizu home phone addresses are copied to him.
sentences.chinese: 隨後我把森木津太郎家嘅電話地址都抄俾咗佢。

sentences.english: Q27. Do you think your company will have redundancy or wage reduction plan in the coming 6 months?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲你嘅公司系嚟緊呢半年，會唔會裁員或者減薪？

sentences.english: D9. What is your company size in Hong Kong?
sentences.chinese: 你公司系香港嘅總員工人數大概系幾多少？

sentences.english: Living with a mother who lied to me for 15 years scares me.
sentences.chinese: 同一個額左我15年嘅媽咪住令我好驚。

sentences.english: Chandler: If can invade Poland, there isn't anything I can't do.
sentences.chinese: 如果我可以入侵波蘭，冇乜嘢我係做唔到嘅。

definition: so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
